subtask.title: Analyze Decision-Making Scenarios for AI Agents
subtask.objective: Determine decision-making contexts where AI agents provide superior outcomes compared to sequential prompts.
subtask.scope: Focus on complex, multi-variable decisions requiring learning and optimization.

verification.completion_summary: The research identified AI agent types (deterministic, generative, hybrid) and their role in workflow automation, with mentions of orchestration and LLM foundations. However, no explicit comparison between AI agents and sequential prompts was made.

missing_aspects: Comparison of AI agents vs. sequential prompts

missing_requirements: Explicit comparison of AI agent outcomes vs. sequential prompts
Detailed analysis of multi-variable decision-making contexts
Mechanisms for learning/optimization in AI agents
